The megan fox nude scene was cut apparently, I searched through and they did not show anything. This is a worthless download because the movie sucks PLUS she's not nude. Do not watch this movie.

john5246, that could be one of the dumber comments on a movie's quality that I have ever read.  Hey guys, don't watch Transformers either, she's not nude in it!  And neither are the robots!  And I so wanted to see some robo-tits.
